item.title: Government documentation
item.description:
Problem

The National Director General for Aliens Policing is the Hungarian authority that examines foreigners to live in Hungary. Their website is the official source of documentation that foreigners rely on when making visa, residency, asylum or citizenship applications.

In February 2025, the NDGCP issued the following government factsheet/administrative update.It’s purpose was to communicate the change in procedure.

I noticed the following issues:

  • Formatting: small font, overuse of bold type, chunky paragraphs
  • Long sentences
  • Lack of structure
  • Unclear who the target is
  • Long and confusing title

The Solution

I edited and re-designed the government circular with respect to document design principles.

item.title: REST API documentation for a mock delivery company
item.description:
Project Details

Goal

Document the mock delivery API using the Open API specification.

Company Background

It is a fictional company called Mock Delivery. It operates in the logistics industry. It manages deliveries of parcels worldwide. The API’s functionality keeps track of: deliveries, drivers, delivery hubs, delivery assignments and reporting.

The mock API was created by Wisdom Nwokocha, lead mentor of the Technical Writing Mentorship Program.

Deliverables

  • test the API and make sure all endpoints are working as expected
  • Produce reference documentation for the API using the Open API Specification (OAS) 3.0
  • host the complete documentation on Gitbook

Accomplishments

Technology Stack

  • API testing: Postman
  • OAS validator: Swagger UI
  • Text editor: Visual Studio Code
  • Markup languages: yaml, json, markdown
  • Static Site Generator: Gitbook
  • json to openapi converter: https://kevinswiber.github.io/postman2openapi/?ref=hackernoon.com
